channel.title: How do you change an Npc's max hit + How do you Change the death/att animations
channel.description: I've recently added some new NPC's. Now i just got back to programming and i need a little bit of help with how to change an NPC's max hit ratio and how to change or add it's attack/death/block animations. Reason being because these are custom NPC's and don't have any line of code under they're names yet :). Anyways i need some help anything will do, thanks.

item.title: How do you change an Npc's max hit + How do you Change the death/att animations
item.dc:creator: @lil-rmj lil-rmj
item.description:
@lil-rmj wrote:

it would help if you told us what type it is ? 317 ? 508 ?

Read full topic
